rule.name: jboss.application.url-syntax
rule.description: Checks jboss.application.url is the valid syntax.
rule.fail-message: jboss.application.url did not pass validation. jboss.application.url must be null or have a value and not contain spaces or back slashes (\). Sample valid value - "http://localhost.nci.nih.gov:port".

rule.name: jboss.application.url-url
rule.description: Checks jboss.application.url has proper value.
rule.fail-message: jboss.application.url did not pass validation. jboss.application.url must be http(s)://* Sample valid value - "http://gforge.nci.nih.gov/svnroot/automation/trunk/software/bda-download/bda-ivy-build.xml".

rule.name: application.context.name-syntax
rule.description: Checks application.context.name is the valid syntax.
rule.fail-message: application.context.name did not pass validation. application.context.name must be null or have a value and not contain spaces, forward slashes (/) or back slashes (\). Sample valid value - "bda".

rule.name: authentication.type-syntax
rule.description: Checks authentication.type is the valid syntax.
rule.fail-message: authentication.type did not pass validation. authentication.type must be null or have a value and not contain spaces, forward slashes (/) or back slashes (\). Sample valid value - "db".

rule.name: authentication.type-value
rule.description: Checks authentication.type has proper value.
rule.fail-message: authentication.type did not pass validation. authentication.type must be empty, db or ldap. Sample valid value "db".

rule.name: jboss.server.port-syntax
rule.description: Checks jboss.server.port is the valid syntax.
rule.fail-message: jboss.server.port did not pass validation. jboss.server.port must be null or have a value and not contain spaces, forward slashes (/) or back slashes (\). Sample valid value - "30210".

rule.name: jboss.server.port-port
rule.description: Checks jboss.server.port has proper value.
rule.fail-message: jboss.server.port did not pass validation. jboss.server.port must be empty or between 0 and 65535. Sample valid value - "30210".

rule.name: jboss.server.ports.name-syntax
rule.description: Checks jboss.server.ports.name is the valid syntax.
rule.fail-message: jboss.server.ports.name did not pass validation. jboss.server.ports.name must be null or have a value and not contain spaces, forward slashes (/) or back slashes (\). Sample valid value - "config39080".

rule.name: jboss.server.ports.name-value-jboss4
rule.description: Checks jboss.server.ports.name has proper value.
rule.fail-message: jboss.server.ports.name did not pass validation. If jboss.ncicb-standard.port-config is true and jboss.major.version is 4 then jboss.server.ports must be one of the following config19080, config19180, config19280, config19380, config19480, config19580, config19680, config29080, config29180, config39080, config39080, config39180, config39180, config39280, config39380, config39480, config39580, config39680, config39780, config39880, config39980, config49080, config49180, config59080, config59180, config59280, config59380, config59480, config59580.

rule.name: jboss.server.ports.name-value-jboss5
rule.description: Checks jboss.server.ports.name has proper value.
rule.fail-message: If jboss.ncicb-standard.port-config is true and jboss.major.version is 5 then jboss.server.ports.name must be one of the following ports-29080, ports-29180, ports-29280, ports-29380, ports-29480, ports-29580, ports-29680, ports-29780, ports-29880, ports-29980.

rule.fail-message: jboss.server.rmi.port did not pass validation. jboss.server.rmi.port must be empty or between 0 and 65535. Sample valid value - "30230".

rule.name: jboss.src.url-syntax
rule.description: Checks jboss.src.url is the valid syntax.
rule.fail-message: jboss.src.url did not pass validation. jboss.src.url must be null or have a value and not contain spaces or back slashes (\). Sample valid value - "http://gforge.nci.nih.gov/svnroot/commonlibrary/trunk/techstack-2007/os-independent/jboss-4.0.5.GA.zip".

rule.name: jboss.src.url-url
rule.description: Checks jboss.src.url has proper value.
rule.fail-message: jboss.src.url did not pass validation. jboss.src.url must be http(s)://*.nci.nih.gov/*. Sample valid value - "http://gforge.nci.nih.gov/svnroot/commonlibrary/trunk/techstack-2007/os-independent/jboss-4.0.5.GA.zip".

rule.name: jboss.ssl.enable-syntax
rule.description: Checks jboss.ssl.enable is the valid syntax.
rule.fail-message: jboss.ssl.enable did not pass validation. jboss.ssl.enable must be null or have a value and not contain spaces, forward slashes (/) or back slashes (\). Sample valid value - "true".

rule.name: jboss.ssl.enable-tf
rule.description: Checks jboss.ssl.enable has proper value.
rule.fail-message: jboss.ssl.enable did not pass validation. Must be empty or true or false.

rule.name: jboss.ssl.enable-relationship
rule.description: Checks jboss.ssl.enable has proper value.
rule.fail-message: jboss.ssl.enable did not pass validation. If true then jboss.ssl.keystore.location, jboss.ssl.keystore.pass, jboss.ssl.keystore.alias, jboss.ssl.fullyqualified.hostname.

rule.fail-message: jboss.ssl.fullyqualified.hostname did not pass validation. jboss.ssl.fullyqualified.hostname must be null or have a value and not contain spaces, forward slashes (/) or back slashes (\). Sample valid value - "localhost.nci.nih.gov".

rule.fail-message: jboss.ssl.keystore.location did not pass validation. jboss.ssl.keystore.location must be null or have a value and not contain spaces or back slashes (\). Sample valid value - "/path/ncicb-test-ssl.keystore".

rule.fail-message: jboss.ssl.keystore.pass did not pass validation. jboss.ssl.keystore.pass must be null or have a value and not contain spaces, forward slashes (/) or back slashes (\). Sample valid value - "ncicb1!".
